text: feels like every time i sorta understand adulting rules they go ahead & change up the game on me. ironies of trying to win at life - it's all perpetual beta testing lol
never thought i'd say this but figuring out philosophy's easier than real-life stuff - bills over Socrates any day. Seems no matter how many pages you turn, life’s rulebook keeps adding chapters.
thought life was gonna be like some novel where you turn pages knowing what comes next but nah, every chapter’s got plot twists no one saw coming 😅
ever seen a "paranormal investigation" line? bookstore receipts looked haunted too lol
